title: Iceye, Satlantis announce plans for Tandem4EO constellation
key_assets: ['Tandem4EO constellation (4 satellites: 2 Iceye SAR satellites + 2 Satlantis optical satellites)', 'Bistatic SAR interferometry capability', 'High-resolution optical imagery (<1m/pixel)', 'Manufacturing and research facilities in Jumilla, Spain (Iceye) and Bilbao, Spain (Satlantis)']
summary: Iceye and Satlantis announced plans to collaborate on the Tandem4EO constellation, comprising four satellites (two Iceye SAR satellites and two Satlantis optical satellites) flying in formation to provide high-resolution radar and optical imagery. The partnership aims to enhance Earth observation capabilities, support Spain's New Space sector, and enable applications like interferometry, disaster monitoring, and infrastructure development.
why_it_matters: This partnership strengthens Europe's Earth observation capabilities by combining SAR and optical imagery, fosters growth in Spain's New Space ecosystem, and demonstrates the potential of public-private collaboration in the aerospace sector. The Tandem4EO constellation could provide unique insights for environmental monitoring, security, and infrastructure development.

entities.name: ICEYE
entities.involvement: Providing 2 SAR satellites, bistatic formation technology, and manufacturing facilities in Spain.

entities.name: Satlantis
entities.involvement: Providing 2 optical satellites with <1m resolution and headquarters in Bilbao, Spain.

entities.name: Spain
entities.involvement: Hosts manufacturing facilities and benefits from the New Space initiative.

relevance_reason: Target company not mentioned in summary
